trans-unit.source: Handles the XML elements used to configure serialization by the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer"></xref>.

This class is used to handle the [\<dataContractSerializer\>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) group, which contains the [\<dataContractSerializer\>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) element, specifically, to allow the addition of types to the collection of known types.
For more information about data contract known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).
For an example of using the element to add to the known types collection, see [\<declaredTypes\>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/declaredtypes.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.SerializationSectionGroup"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection"></xref> used to set up the known types collection.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection"></xref> used for the serialization configuration section.
Gets the serialization configuration section for the specified configuration.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.Configuration"></xref> that represents the configuration to retrieve.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.SerializationSectionGroup"></xref> that represents the configuration section.
Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.NetDataContractSerializerSection"></xref> used to set up the known types collection.
